response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $13,500, which we believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and your perceived value. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a product that meets your expectations while also providing us with a fair return for our investment. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and excellent customer service to make your experience with us as pleasant as possible.", "product_price": 13500}
